Question
========

Suppose that in a certain population a variable has an expectation of 20 and a variance of 100. We now randomly draw a sample of 25 independent observations from this population. Then the standard deviation of the sample mean is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.4
* 2
* 4
* 20

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.4: Incorrect
* 2: Correct
* 4: Incorrect
* 20: Incorrect
